title: WEDNESDAY - The gift that keeps on giving 2020
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY - The gift that keeps on giving 2020
description:
Get ready to spend Christmas weekend on the couch as the NFL brings you four-straight days of games (0:06) kicking off Friday with the Vikings and Saints. We have the latest status updates on Lions center Frank Ragnow (0:54), Bucs running back Ronald Jones (1:01) and the 49ers QB situation (1:22). It's a big-time matchup with playoff implications when the Colts and Steelers face off (2:01) as Mike Tomlin talks (2:29) about if he plans to shake up the starting lineup. Seahawks wide receiver Josh Gordon (3:26) in trouble again, and speaking of trouble, Washington QB Dwayne Haskins (3:49) puts his status for Sunday's game in jeopardy

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
